page.title: 05Fishing on the Tay <Page 2>
page.content: A Ghillie keeps his area free from pollution,poaching and predators. {4> What types of fish are caught and {when are they caught? On the Tay we fish for salmon between 15th January and 15th October. The brown trout season lasts from 15th March until the 6th October. {5> Describe your favourite fish, {tackle, bait and stretch of the river. My favourite fishing is fly fishing for trout. Having said that my clearest memory is of catching salmon particularly big salmon. I have never really felt that one beat on the upper Tay is any better than another although that is not true of the lower Tay.
